desc: Located on the mighty Clarence River, the alluvial soil flats, enhanced with Bio-Activ Biochar, provide the perfect growing medium. We are currently growing beautiful Elephant Garlic, also called Giant Russian Garlic, without chemicals. Place orders now for February delivery. It is sure to go quickly.

layout.text:
Clarence River Farm is nestled on the banks of the Clarence River in the beautiful Grafton hinterland, 20 minutes from the city centre.
Boasting ideal growing conditions for various fruits and vegetables. We're sure you will love our produce as much as we love growing it!
